Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: Selecciona el suplente que se puede usar para serializar .

span.span: Selects the surrogate that can be used to serialize an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] Un suplente de serialización le ofrece un objeto que puede controlar los requisitos de serialización de un objeto diferente y, si es necesario, puede transformar los datos serializados.A serialization surrogate gives you an object that can handle the serialization requirements of a different object and, if necessary, can transform the serialized data.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate GetSurrogate(class System.Type type, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context, [out] class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector& selector) cil managed

public: override System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializationSurrogate ^ GetSurrogate(Type ^ type, System::Runtime::Serialization::StreamingContext context, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Runtime::Serialization::ISurrogateSelector ^ % selector);

abstract member GetSurrogate : Type * System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext * -> System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate override this.GetSurrogate : Type * System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext * -> System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate

param.name: type
param.span: La clase para la que se va a obtener el suplente.

span.span: The for which to obtain a surrogate.

param.name: context
param.span: que sirve como contexto de origen o de destino para la serialización actual.

span.span: A that serves as the source or destination context for the current serialization.

param.name: selector
param.span: El resultado que devuelve este método contiene un que incluye una referencia al selector de suplentes donde se encontró el suplente adecuado.

span.span: When this method returns, contains an that holds a reference to the surrogate selector where the appropriate surrogate was found.

param.span: Este parámetro se pasa sin inicializar.

summary.span: Encuentra el suplente que representa el tipo especificado, comenzando por el selector de suplentes definido para un contexto de serialización específico.

span.span: Finds the surrogate that represents the specified type, starting with the specified surrogate selector for the specified serialization context.

returns.span: El suplente adecuado para el tipo y contexto especificados.

span.span: The appropriate surrogate for the specified type and context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El tipo de suplente devuelto depende de qué tipo es asignable desde `type`.The type of surrogate returned is dependent upon what type is assignable from `type`.

span.span: contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
